questions.text: In what year does the movie begin?
questions.explanation:
1944.

	The movie begins in Scotland in October 1944, and moves on to present day.  In 1944, a secret Nazi ceremony is infiltrated.  The ceremony is based on unlocking a portal between earth, and Gods of Chaos.

questions.text: What chocolate bar does Professor Bruttenholm give the baby, Hellboy in 1944?
questions.explanation:
Baby Ruth.

	By using the Baby Ruth, the Professor lured Hellboy to him, and time passes sixty years in the story where Hellboy remains alive.

questions.text: What is the Bureau of Paranormal Research and Defense disguised as?
questions.explanation:
Waste Management Plant.

	The Waste Management sign is posted overtop the intercom we are shown at the outside gates of the building.  The Bureau is located in Newark, New Jersey.

questions.text: What is Agent John Myers' middle name?
questions.explanation:
Thadius & Thadeus & Thaddeus.

	Agent John Myers was born in Kansas City in 1976.  His bio is told by Abraham Sapien when he is first met in his tank.

Hound.

	Abraham Sapien states that Sammael is a Hound of Resurrection, meaning that after he has been killed, he can return.  Hellboy and Sammael battle in a museum, in busy streets, and in a subway.

questions.text: On the subway train, what is Hellboy beaten with?
questions.explanation:
Fire Extinguisher.

	The subway train operator smashes Hellboy in the face with a fire extinguisher.  After proclaiming he's on their side, Hellboy drops under the train, and waits till it has passed to fight Sammael.

questions.text: How many eggs were deposited into Hellboy?
questions.explanation:
Three.

	Hellboy had three eggs deposited into his left arm during the five seconds he left a weird demon-like object on it.  The eggs aresensitive to heat and light.

questions.text: What colour fire does Liz Sherman create?
questions.explanation:
Blue.

	Liz creates blue fire because she is pyrokinetic, meaning she can control fire with her mind.

questions.text: During Professor Bruttenholm's funeral, it was rainy.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Professor Bruttenholm was killed by Kroenen who woke up after pretending he was dead.  The Professor was slit in the back of the neck.

questions.text: What was Hellboy's right hand actually created as?
questions.explanation:
A key.

	The hand is actually a key used to open the portal to the Gods of Chaos.  Hellboy opens the door, but saves the day.
